attributes.action: Stop Tier 5. Tier 4 restrictions should be the highest placed on the public
attributes.additional_details:
To bring an end to the lockdown and tier system immediately and design new ways to combat COVID-19. Locking people in their houses, not allowing them to see loved ones is causing more pain, suffering and loss than COVID-19 itself. It is the Government's failure to deal with COVID-19 correctly that has made us all suffer from heavy lockdown restrictions.
The loss of vulnerable and lonely people from these heavy handed restrictions on the public will be greater than the loss of people to COVID-19
attributes.background:
The Government should discuss expanding test centres and other safe avenues for the public, Not tighter more damaging restrictions that are causing distress and pain to millions of citizens, especially vulnerable people.
Tier 4 should be the very highest restricted level the UK ever enters

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862
